channel.title: Dimensionality Reduction on Learn with AI
channel.description: Recent content in Dimensionality Reduction on Learn with AI

item.title: Principal Component Analysis
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Principal Component Analysis ChatGPT answer: As an AI language model, I can provide five questions about Principal Component Analysis: What is Principal Component Analysis and what is its main objective? What are the assumptions made while performing the Principal Component Analysis? How is the number of principal components chosen in Principal Component Analysis? Can PCA be used to reduce the number of features in a dataset?

item.title: t-SNE
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about t-SNE ChatGPT answer: What is t-SNE and how does it work? How is t-SNE different from other dimensionality reduction techniques? What are the main advantages and limitations of t-SNE? How can t-SNE be used for data visualization and clustering? What are some practical applications of t-SNE in fields such as image and text analysis? Explain User ask: Explain t-SNE and give an example ChatGPT answer:
